services.hero_subtitle: Fast, high quality and accessible - see our offer.
services.main_text:
Our institution offers you:

- Photocopying and printing: 
Copy and print documents in black and white or color, different formats (A4 and A3). Copy the price: A4 one-sided from 1.8 to 5 dinars per page, A3 from 5 to 12 dinars per page. 

- Color printing: 
from 10 to 25 dinars per page. Scan documents: 15 dinars per page.

- Bookkeeping services: 
Professional binding and production of crankshaft for diplomatic theses, doctoral dissertations and other documents. Price for binding graduates (hard cover): 354 dinars per work.

- Connecting the script: 
from 118 to 236 dinars per scenario.

- Creating a cover:
 from 354 to 708 dinars per piece.

- Recover old books: 
Price negotiable. Our expert team is available for all questions and additional information. 

Visit us or contact us for more detailed information on all services and current prices.

validation.copyrights_max: Copyright text may not be greater than 255 characters.

validation.logo_light_max: Light logo may not be larger than 2MB.
validation.logo_dark_image: Dark logo must be an image.
validation.logo_dark_max: Dark logo may not be larger than 2MB.

history.title: History
history.content: At the beginning of the 20th century, Novi Pazar was a culturally and economically underdeveloped town. Cultural life was divided along religious lines: Muslims maintained private libraries in homes and mosques, while the Orthodox community organized church libraries and reading rooms. In 1912, the first printing press appeared, followed by the first local newspaper in 1921. The first public library in Novi Pazar was officially established on June 30, 1921. During the interwar period, libraries mainly existed within schools. World War II brought devastation—most books were destroyed or lost. After the war, efforts were made to rebuild. The People’s Library was founded on December 23, 1944. Despite modest beginnings in poor facilities, by 1957 it became the “Dositej Obradović” City Library. Over the next decades, it expanded its collection and services, becoming the municipal reference library in 1983. In 1996, it moved to its current building in the city park. Modernization began in 2006 with the introduction of the COBISS system and electronic lending. Today, the library has 25 employees, 10 departments, about 80,000 books, and around 5,000 active members yearly. It remains a key cultural institution in Novi Pazar.

complaints.title: Complaints, Suggestions and Comments
complaints.description: We are committed to providing superior service and we are constantly improving our work. Every complaint, suggestion or comment, help us become even better. Feel free to contact us!
complaints.content: Your opinion is important to us. If you have any complaint, question, proposal or objection, please fill out the form below. We carefully consider each request and try to answer as soon as possible. Complete all required fields and describe your problem or suggestion until we can help you effectively.

contact.content: Our team is here to answer all your questions and give you the best possible service!
contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: Your questions, suggestions or praise are welcome!
